title: Bug 123036: Data in a report is doubly stored
description: The bug involves double storage of data in a report, impacting the integrity of the information.
OB: Upon generating the report, I observed that the data instances are being stored twice in the content stream.
EB: The expected behavior is that each data instance should be stored only once in the content stream, ensuring data consistency and eliminating redundancy.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Navigate to the reporting module.
2. Generate a report with multiple data instances.
3. Examine the content stream or storage backend to observe the duplication of data instances.
